movies.title: Shinjuku Swan
movies.plot: Set in Shinjuku, an entertainment and red-light district, Tokyo, Japan. The main character Tatsuhiko doesn't have money or a job. One day, he meets a scout who recruits girls on the streets to work in the adult entertainment business. Tatsuhiko soon works as a scout too.
movies.simplePlot: Set in Shinjuku, an entertainment and red-light district, Tokyo, Japan. The main character Tatsuhiko doesn't have money or a job. One day, he meets a scout who recruits girls on the streets...

biography.bio: Erika Sawajiri was born on April 8, 1986 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Shinobi: Heart Under Blade (2005), Helter Skelter (2012) and Break Through! (2004). She was previously married to Tsuyoshi Takashiro.
biography.name: Erika Sawajiri

biography.bio: Japanese actor, born on 20th October 1983, teen heartthrob Yamada Takayuki, first started out co-starring in a handful of Jdoramas before making a big splash on Waterboys (2003). He followed with Fireboys (2004), his award winning performance in Crying Out Love, in the Center of the World (2004), Churasan 3 and the recent H2 (2005). His remarkable acting makes him most outstanding among the younger generation of Japanese actors.
biography.name: Takayuki Yamada

biography.bio: Yûsuke Iseya was born on May 29, 1976 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Blindness (2008), 13 assassins (2010) and Casshern (2004).
biography.name: Yûsuke Iseya

biography.bio: Gô Ayano is an actor, known for The Light Shines Only There (2014), 64: Part I (2016) and The Snow White Murder Case (2014).
biography.name: Gô Ayano

biography.bio: Ken Yasuda is an actor and director, known for Spirited Away (2001), Howl's Moving Castle (2004) and Le royaume des chats (2002).
biography.name: Ken Yasuda

biography.bio: Erina Mano is an actress, known for Tag (2015), The Next Generation: Patlabor (2014) and Kono yo ni tayasui shigoto wa nai (2017).
biography.name: Erina Mano

biography.bio: Jun Murakami was born on July 23, 1973 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Nabbie no koi (1999), Cutie Honey: Live Action (2004) and Ritual (2000). He was previously married to Ua.
biography.name: Jun Murakami

biography.bio: Motoki Fukami is an actor, known for Why Don't You Play in Hell? (2013), Guilty of Romance (2011) and Balloon Club Revisited (2006).
biography.name: Motoki Fukami

biography.bio: Kosuke Toyohara was born on September 25, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah (1991), Mr. Baseball (1992) and Into the Sun (2005).
biography.name: Kosuke Toyohara

biography.bio: Yûki Kubota is an actor, known for Kamen Rider Gaim (2013), An Assassin (2011) and Garo and the Wailing Dragon (2012).
biography.name: Yûki Kubota

biography.bio: Yû Yamada was born on July 5, 1984 in Okinawa, Japan. She is an actress, known for Vision: Koroshi ga mieru onna (2012), Gekijô ban Kanna san daiseikô desu! (2009) and Akihabara@Deep (2006). She has been married to Shun Oguri since March 14, 2012.
biography.name: Yû Yamada

biography.bio: Ayaka Morita was born on December 26, 1988 in Narashino, Japan. She is an actress, known for Ghostwriter Go, Shoujotachi no rashinban (2011) and Monster Killer (2011).
biography.name: Ayaka Morita

biography.bio: Mao Asou is known for her work on 13 assassins (2010), R100 (2013) and Shin Godzilla (2016).
biography.name: Mao Asou

biography.bio: Nobuaki Kaneko is an actor and composer, known for Crows Zero II (2009), The Snow White Murder Case (2014) and Love Strikes! (2011). He has been married to Saori Nakamura since 2013.
biography.name: Nobuaki Kaneko

biography.bio: Kôtarô Yoshida was born on January 26, 1971 in Okayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kids Return (1996), Makai tenshô: The Armageddon (1999) and The Long Goodbye (2014).
biography.name: Kôtarô Yoshida
